user_query: I'm organizing a company outing and we want to watch an NFL game together. Can you give me the upcoming NFL games and the bookmaker odds for the games? Also, fetch the details of the latest album released by the artist who performed at the Super Bowl halftime show this year.

TaskList.description: Fetch the schedule of upcoming NFL games.
Retrieve the bookmaker odds for the upcoming NFL games obtained in Subtask 1.
Find out the artist who performed at the Super Bowl halftime show this year.
Fetch the details of the latest album released by the artist identified in Subtask 3.
